sections.text: You stand at the entrance of the legendary Crystal Caverns. A cold breeze carries whispers from the darkness below. A broken rope bridge leads into the depths.

options.description: Search the rocky walls for another path

sections.text: Your hands brush against the cold stone until you find a hidden crevice leading downward. It's dark, but you hear faint dripping water.

consequence.text: You scrape your shoulder squeezing through the narrow gap.

sections.text: The bridge creaks under your weight. Halfway across, a plank snaps beneath your foot!

options.description: Hold on tightly and crawl across
Try to jump to the other side

consequence.text: You land hard and twist your ankle.

sections.text: You emerge into a glittering chamber filled with glowing crystals. At the center lies a pedestal holding an ancient gemstone.
You crawl to safety on the other side, breathing heavily. A winding path descends deeper into the cavern.

consequence.text: You feel slightly better after resting.

sections.text: You barely make the jump, but the rope bridge collapses behind you. There's no turning back now.
The moment you touch the gemstone, the chamber begins to shake violently. A secret door opens to reveal a hidden passage.

options.description: Drop the gemstone and run back

sections.text: You reach a vast underground lake glowing with bioluminescent crystals. A small boat waits at the shore.

options.description: Take the boat across the lake

consequence.text: The freezing water chills you to the bone.

sections.text: After a short rest, you feel strong enough to continue your journey.
The hidden passage leads to a giant crystal throne room, where an ancient spirit awaits.
The boat carries you safely across, but you sense something massive moving in the depths below.
You manage to swim across, shivering but alive. The glowing crystals ahead light your way to a massive door.
An unreachable dead end. You shouldn't be here.
